tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have been visiting Dr. Suhasini from October, 2016. Apart from helping with the delivery of our baby, her methods of treatment has been very good. She doesn't recommend unnecessary medications and always suggest the best way forward. We met her recently for some advice and she definitely made us feel positive about how to plan for the future. A must recommended doctor!

tags: None
review: I hv been her patient for the past 13 years.  Not only me, I hv referred her to many of my friends.  Everybody's experience was wonderful.  The determination, dedication, ********* ***** *** **** and simplicity in her approach has no words to explain. She is my inspiration.  No doubt she Wl b an inspirating and a helpful person for those who approach her.  Hands off to u Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have taken 9 months pregnancy treatment from Dr Suhasini and delivered baby successfully. Me and my husband are very happy with her treatment. She is very experience  and helpful. Won't give unnecessary medicines. Will not call unnecssary for  checkup. 
*** ** **** ************** ** ********* . Highly recommended .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: A terrible excuse for a doctor, she gave us no diagnosis paper, but slapped a test on us right away. The doctor was in a hurry to see us out of her cabin, and the attendant was in a hurry to charge us a consultation fee. Did we understand what the doctor meant by her two minute prognosis on a cyst in the uterus of my daughter? NO. it is a doctor's job to explain precisely and clearly what the problem at hand might be, but this lady showed no such concern. We were more confused than ever about the problem in my daughter's uterus. ** **** **** **** ********** ****** **** ***** *********** *** *** ****** ***** ** *** ***** ** ****** ***** ****** *** ** ********* ** ******* ***** ******* *** **** ***** *** ** *****

tags: None
review: She is ****** ******* *** extremely composed. Will analyse the patient problems well and provides treatment. Shall surely recommend her to others. I had suffered from complications during my pregnancy, but she helped me to deliver a healthy baby. She was a good emotional support at the  time of need.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited Dr Suhasini from when I was planning on conceiving. It's been several months since then and I have a baby girl right now. I did not have any complication conceiving or throughout my pregnancy. *** ********** *** ***** ********* ** *** *** ***** *** ****** * *** ****** ********** My delivery was however a little complicated. During my last trimester I had conveyed to her that I am inclined towards a normal delivery if situation permits. During delivery, after 12 hours of labor, my baby was not coming out. She had to then vacuum my baby out as she was a big one. I appreciate the fact that she did not go for an emergency c-section.

tags: Wait time,
review: Overall it was okay..only thing I didn't like was when I mentioned Dr. Suhasini that it was my second opinion from her and I have already done the test..her behaviour totally changed and she got little irate.. after that she didn't even listened to me properly where I was trying to say her about the medicine which I am taking.. also since I didn't get appointment that day but could manage somehow..so in front of me itself she told that not to entertain any patients without the appointment..which I personally didn't like.. she did some examine just to increase the bill which I felt was unnecessary.. I am not sure whether I should visit her again.. if some one coming for a second opinion they should treat them properly.. I would recommend peeple to visit her but also assure them they can get such behaviour..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,Pregnancy,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: I met doctor Suhasini through a friend who had similar infertility issues. Even though Doctor does not talk much her attention and care for the patient was never less. She has clarity on the treatment, let's us know of the issue and offers her best judgement, which worked for me. I am now a mother of 3 year old and there is not a day that goes by without thanking doctor Suhasini. During my infertility treatment and pregnancy days I have always seen Doctor Suhasini as another mother for me. Her positive attitude had an overall impact on me during my tough days. Thank you, Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As of now we are under treatment. As always Dr. Suhasini has been great and helpful. Always recommend to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
We were looking for Dr. shenoy's appointment. But since she wasn't available we consulted Dr. Suhasini. 
Doctor was so rude that my wife, who is generally strong, used to be scared to visit her. It was more like getting scolded by a school teacher.

After 4 visits, we thought we had enough and move on to a different hospital altogether. I can't rate the treatment since we could not continue for long after what happened.
